Package com.ftc11392.sequoia.subsystem

Class PIDFSubsystem

java.lang.Object
com.ftc11392.sequoia.subsystem.Subsystem
com.ftc11392.sequoia.subsystem.PIDFSubsystem
public abstract class PIDFSubsystem
extends Subsystem
A Subsystem that uses a PIDFController to control itself.

  • Constructor Details

    • PIDFSubsystem

      public PIDFSubsystem​(PIDFController controller, double setpoint, org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.Telemetry telemetry, Task defaultTask)
      Instantiates a PIDFSubsystem.
      Parameters:
      controller - the PIDFController to use
      setpoint - the initial setpoint
      telemetry - Telemetry from an OpMode for the task to be able to send information to a Driver Station.
      defaultTask - the default Task of the Subsystem

    • PIDFSubsystem

      public PIDFSubsystem​(PIDFController controller, double setpoint, org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.Telemetry telemetry)

      Instantiates a PIDFSubsystem with an initial setpoint of 0.
      Parameters:
      controller - the PIDFController to use
      telemetry - Telemetry from an OpMode for the task to be able to send information to a Driver Station.
